statements: SELECT * FROM progression_table;
SELECT player_name, level FROM progression_table;
SELECT player_id, player_name, experience_points FROM progression_table;
SELECT * FROM progression_table ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, experience_points FROM progression_table WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_name, level FROM progression_table WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_name, experience_points FROM progression_table WHERE experience_points BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM progression_table WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' AND level > 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC, level DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level, experience_points FROM progression_table WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_name, SUM(experience_points) AS total_experience FROM progression_table GROUP BY player_name HAVING SUM(experience_points) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM progression;
SELECT player_id, player_level FROM progression WHERE experience_points > 1000;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM progression ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players JOIN progression ON players.player_id = progression.player_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT player_id, player_level FROM progression WHERE experience_points > 10000 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, experience_points FROM players INNER JOIN progression ON players.player_id = progression.player_id WHERE player_level >= 5 ORDER BY experience_points ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_level, experience_points FROM progression WHERE player_level BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY experience_points DESC, player_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_levels;
SELECT level, experience_points FROM player_levels WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, level FROM player_levels WHERE experience_points > 1000;
SELECT quest_name, completion_status FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, quest_id FROM player_quests WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM player_levels WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, level, experience_points FROM player_levels WHERE level BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY experience_points DESC;
SELECT player_id, quest_name, completion_status FROM player_quests INNER JOIN quests ON player_quests.quest_id = quests.quest_id WHERE player_quests.completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, level, SUM(experience_points) AS total_experience FROM player_levels GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_experience > 5000 ORDER BY total_experience DESC;
SELECT MAX(level) AS max_level, MIN(level) AS min_level FROM player_levels;
SELECT * FROM progression;
SELECT player_id, level, experience_points FROM progression WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_age FROM players WHERE player_age < 30;
SELECT guild_id, guild_name, guild_leader_id FROM guilds;
SELECT * FROM progression WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_age FROM players ORDER BY player_age DESC;
SELECT guild_name, guild_leader_id FROM guilds WHERE guild_leader_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM progression WHERE level > 10);
SELECT player_name, rank FROM players LEFT JOIN leaderboard ON players.player_id = leaderboard.player_id;
SELECT player_name, level, experience_points FROM progression JOIN players ON progression.player_id = players.player_id WHERE level >= 5 ORDER BY experience_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM progression;
SELECT player_id, level, experience_points FROM progression WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_name, level_name FROM players JOIN levels ON players.player_id = levels.level_id;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name FROM players JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id;
SELECT * FROM progression WHERE player_id = 123 AND level < 5;
SELECT * FROM progression
SELECT player_id, level, experience_points FROM progression WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, player_name, progressions.level, levels.level_name FROM players JOIN progression ON players.player_id = progression.player_id JOIN levels ON progression.level = levels.level_id

SELECT players.player_name, COUNT(player_achievements.achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM players LEFT JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id GROUP BY players.player_name

SELECT players.player_name, achievements.achievement_name FROM players JOIN player_achievements ON players.player_id = player_achievements.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_achievements.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id
